sentences.sContent: Life's transition from the sea to the land was perhaps as much of an evolutionary challenge as was the genesis of life.
sentences.sContent_eng: Life's transition from the sea to the land was perhaps as much of an evolutionary challenge as was the genesis of life.
sentences.sCn: 这句话的意思是说，“（如果说）生命的起源是个进化的挑战（的话），（那么）生命从海洋到陆地的演变是个更大程度的进化挑战。”

remMethod.val: gene (产生， 基因) + sis → 创始； 大写Genesis专指《圣经》中的《创世纪》

trans.tranOther: the beginning or origin of something
